parameter.label: Room
parameter.description: Displays the room which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Category
parameter.description: Displays the category which is configured in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Presence connected
parameter.description: TRUE if a presence detector is connected to DisMv in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Unreachable
parameter.description: Set to "true" when the device is unreachable. This means that the associated control no longer exists in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: Armed
parameter.description: shows if the AlarmControl is armed. set to true to arm, set to false to disable

parameter.label: Next level
parameter.description: the ID of the next alarm level.

parameter.label: Next level delay
parameter.description: The delay of the next level in seconds, this can be specified with the parameters D1 - D6 in Loxone Config. This increments every second.

parameter.label: next level delay total
parameter.description: The total delay of the next level in seconds, this can be specified with the parameters D1 - D6 in Loxone Config.

parameter.label: level
parameter.description: The ID of the current alarm level.

parameter.label: Armed delay
parameter.description: The delay of the alarm control being armed.

parameter.label: Armed delay total
parameter.description: The total delay of the alarm control being armed.

parameter.label: Sensors
parameter.description: A string of sensors that triggered a alarm separated by a pipe ("|").

parameter.label: Disabled move
parameter.description: If the movement is disabled or not.

parameter.label: Arm mode
parameter.description: set to 0 or 1 to arm with/without movement.

parameter.label: Arm delay
parameter.description: Arms the AlarmControl with the given delay (Parameter "Da" in Loxone Config).

parameter.label: Arm delay mode
parameter.description: set to 0 or 1 to arm with/without movement after the given delay (Parameter "Da" in Loxone Config).
